snippet.title: The Outlast Trials: Project Breach Trailer – PC Gaming Show: Most Wanted 2024
snippet.description:
Red Barrels brings players its latest terrifying cooperative social experiment in 2025, although this time it involves a test subject that has escaped The Outlast Trials’ facility.
https://www.pcgamer.com

PC Gamer is the global authority on PC games. We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
#pcgamer #pcgaming #PCGSMW #theoutlasttrials #outlastrialsprojectbreach
